attributes.action: Ban Donald Trump from entering the British Isles
attributes.additional_details:
Here's a short list about only some of the things he's said.  Evidence can be found in the media. 
- Speaks very detrogitory about women and has been accussed of sexual assult by several people.
- Wants to discriminate a religion from entering the US
- Wants to abandon NATO which is important to the other nations
- Has said climate change is a Hoax started by the chinese
- Incites and encourages violence against oppoisition
and much more!
attributes.background: Donald Trump has cause much controversy with his remarks and views.  Now elected as president, he's in a position to cause unrest with people that are not in agreement.  Coming to the UK will give him publicity and increase his influence and show the UK is accepting of his policies and views.
